title: Drawing, "Floor show in a night club", ca. 1935
medium: Black paper design in white outline
description: View of far side of night club. Faces and figures in white outline on black. Upper half shows white half circle in which a couple are dancing - the man in formal evening clothes and woman in red dress.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Floor show in a night club", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Black paper design in white outline. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-2.
